about_the_game:
The DLC adds a new gameplay mode where players take control over a premade strike group and have to use all of the available resources to their maximum potential in order to complete new historically-inspired mission.

A reconnaissance mission. Year 1942.
A US submarine sighted the largest battleship ever encountered. Their rapport must be confirmed by aerial scouts. The player is tasked with approaching the sighting area and sending recon and identify missions towards the new discovery. The area is not safe though. There are Japanese carriers patrolling it.
detailed_description:
The DLC adds a new gameplay mode where players take control over a premade strike group and have to use all of the available resources to their maximum potential in order to complete new historically-inspired mission.

A reconnaissance mission. Year 1942.
A US submarine sighted the largest battleship ever encountered. Their rapport must be confirmed by aerial scouts. The player is tasked with approaching the sighting area and sending recon and identify missions towards the new discovery. The area is not safe though. There are Japanese carriers patrolling it.
name: Aircraft Carrier Survival: End of Harmony (Mission 1)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7,8 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A brand new mission and a new ship for campaign mode await you in this add-on.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
